snippet.title: Deep Rock Galactic - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
DEEP ROCK GALACTIC is a co-op-first sci-fi FPS featuring badass space Dwarves, 100% destructible environments, procedurally-generated caves, and endless hordes of alien monsters.

Coming as Game Preview on Xbox One, Windows 10 and Steam Early Access on February 28th, 2018!

--------------------
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/548430/Deep_Rock_Galactic/
Microsoft Store: https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9NHFVWX1V7QJ

--------------------
Find out more:
http://www.deeprockgalactic.com/

Follow Deep Rock Galactic on Facebook and Twitter
https://www.facebook.com/joindeeprock/
https://twitter.com/joindeeprock/
